metadata.title: CVE-2022-3545 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability has been found in Linux Kernel and classified as critical.Affected by this vulnerability is the function area_cache_get of the filedrivers/net/ethernet/netronome/nfp/nfpcore/nfp_cppcore.c of the componentIPsec. The manipulation leads to use after free. It is recommended to applya patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211045 was assigned to thisvulnerability.
